website_summaries.verdict: Heavy to carry around, this needs a better tripod than the one provided, and the smartphone attachment is disappointing.
pros: Perfect for bird-watching, with phone attachment making it easier to view and photograph wildlife
Clear, focused image from 50 to 200 yards
Smartphone adapter can hold larger devices like the iPhone 6
Works well for nighttime moon viewing
cons: Scope is pretty heavy at more than 5 lbs
Tripod is cheaply made and doesn’t support scope well
Field of view is very narrow at longer zoom ranges
Smartphone images taken at longer range don’t turn out well

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spotting scope and phone adapter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent spotting scope and phone adapter. I can see my shooting targets at varied distances with very good clarity. I can see from 5 yards to 500 yards that I have tested so far. I would recommend these items as a good buy for a great price. Arrived on time and in a very secure package
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope
customer_reviews.text: This scope is awesome. My husband wanted it to look across the lake at our cottage and to be able to see the loons and divi ng ducks on the Lake. It's perfect for what we want. Very pleased with our purchase. The only problem is that the mount for the cell phone is designed to hold a small cell phone, we have the galaxy S7 and the mount is too small to hold the phone :/
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scope
customer_reviews.text: This scope is outstanding. I have 3 other astronomical telescopes including an 8" reflector. When I received the GoSky spotting scope today I thought it just might be a piece of junk for $129. Boy, was I wrong. I do not have a single complaint. Even my solar filter to view sunspots fit over the 80mm objective lens. Excellent image quality and solid build.Buy this scope. You will be very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Wildlife photos.
customer_reviews.text: I found the Gosky scope easy to use and was able to use my old FOCAL tripod that I used several years ago for my VHS camcorder. I bought the scope to watch wildlife behind our Florida home and very satisfied with results. The cell phone attachment to take photos takes some effort to get everything set right to take photos and the reason I did not give 5 stars. But when it's right it works fine and will probably improve with some experience on my part. I will include a couple photos and I recommend the Gosky scope for watching wildlife from a stationary position on a tripod. Tonight I'm going to try to watch the ISS fly over.
customer_reviews.author: John or Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money spotting scope. I use mine for taking pictures of birds using the Smart Phone Adaptor that comes included. I will say this setup is limited in the kind of pictures you can take and really is only good for pictures of sitting subjects at a specific range. Changing the zoom and focus take far too long for fast moving or flying critters. The picture quality is good though and I would recommend this scope for anyone looking to get into wildlife photography.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: can see Saturn and Jupiter with this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this thing to just look at birds. I pointed it at Jupiter and was not disappointed. You can easily see the moons of Jupiter (and stripes) as well as the rings of Saturn with this scope. Don't get me wrong, the two planets mentioned do not look very big through the scope but you can still see them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brighter and Clearer Pictures
customer_reviews.text: This spotting scope is easier to adjust and focus on the target with brighter and clearer pictures. The quick set up manual is simple to follow up. I like the bag come with the package since we like to take it out with us when we go back to Costa Rica again. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: It works excellent for both purposes
customer_reviews.text: Bought to glass for game animals and call long range shots. It works excellent for both purposes. I leave it on 20x most the time to maintain a bright, crisp, and clear image. In the higher magnification ranges the images get dark and distorted and the mirage is brutal. Took it out too look for some elk spotted a herd of cows at a lasered 800m. Got bored of watching them and started glassing out farther and spotted some antelope out past where my rangefinder would work ( it'll range to 1800m usually). Get a better tripod and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D 4man

customer_reviews.title: OK for the range, not so good for the field
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. You're paying for a decent spotting scope. Anything over 100 yards and you'll be disappointed. Fogs up in humid conditions. Just fine for sighting in small caliber and bows. Personally, I wish I had put some more $$ into the purchase. Live and learn...
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Mine Was Defective
customer_reviews.text: The focusing mag ring went around in circles and apparently was not connected at factory. The images that I did get were slightly blurred compared to my Landove 20-60X80 spotting scope. Also, the tripod was nervous in that the slightest bit of movement started the scope bounding up and down. Count on getting a new tripod. Be sure to loosen the locking ring before trying to move the magnification ring. Maybe that is was happened. The Landove was a better scope for me and I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Inspired Dribble

customer_reviews.title: Got it to use as a spotting scope while shooting at distance but have been using it to see the deer and turkey in the fields and have been able to get great photos/videos with this scope
customer_reviews.text: For the price this can not be beat. Trusted the reviews and picked this up. Got it to use as a spotting scope while shooting at distance but have been using it to see the deer and turkey in the fields and have been able to get great photos/videos with this scope. Spotted a 10pt buck that looked like a doe at the distance he was away in the failing light. Will definitely get a standard size tripod for this though the little thing it comes with is great but a bit of a pain to find a spot for when looking over different fields but great for shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Herro Sailor. Ruv you rong time.
customer_reviews.text: Instruction sheet is not very good. Not bad for a translation of instructions from some Asian language for English language users. Included two different camera adapters for Phone Cameras.. First impression favorable. Better Zoom scopes don't need so much refocus when changing zoom. Not great zoom focus tracking. The price is right for a cheapskate like me. It is GoSky not Gosky. The second one looks like a Russian name.
customer_reviews.author: Warren E. Witzell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Price, of course, is the best selling point here. Not bad, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice optics, for the price. I found the view quite nice on the low power magnification. The controls are smooth. The tripod is pretty weak. Expect the need for a heavier one. One sad thing about my scope is that it does not focus at infinity. That means peeking at the moon is not very clear. But hey, what do you want for under $200? Pretty good all around.
customer_reviews.author: James Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Best available (at any price?)
customer_reviews.text: First one was very good but had internal spot in lower right quadrant. Returned. Second one ok. All features worked well. Very clear. Could read a sign on a building seven miles away. Could see the feathers on red tailed hawk sitting on a church steeple at one mile. Clarity and resolution seemed to maintain well at all power settings. I do not see how higher priced scopes can be significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: angus

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Just to let everyone know, I own scopes made by Leupold, Shepherd, Schmidt and Bender, etc. I do appreciate a fine product. This product smokes! I bought this with the idea of giving it to one of my sons who is a marksman and a hunter. Instead, I will just add this to my growing collection. Excellent power, clarity and view. Caveat, don't know how long it will last and how long it will maintain its quality. As I said previously, I own some high-quality glass.
customer_reviews.author: GR Isidro

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE FOR THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: Received this Spotting Scope in good time. Was excited to get it. My very, very old Spotting Scope was not any good for much anymore. Have not been able to get out with it quite yet, but what I have seen it looks really good. I was thinking that the big Primary Lens would fill up the eyepiece, but when looking it's much smaller in view. Have not used the cell phone attachment yet. Hope it works just like it says. The Tripod you get with this is not all that great. Think the manufacturer could have done better. Not sure if I'll use this or not. Will use my Tripod for Photography. The view is nice and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Corker2

customer_reviews.title: Very good spotting scope
customer_reviews.text: Very good spotting scope! Easy adapt with my iPhone. Gives bright crisp images! Easy to zoom on the target and also waterproof. So l can use it with out worrying wet conditions. The tripod that comes with the scope is very useful. Easy to put the scope on the window s looking for the target . The best part is there is 1year free exchange warranty. That makes me feel safe. My son loves it very much. I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ai ci zhang

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: When doing target shooting with a rifle, you need a scope in order to check your accuracy. Shooting then looking into a scope is inconvenient. By adding the ability to just look over and view your accuracy (or inaccuracy) with a quick glance makes things very easy. Attaching the camera to the scope was very easy and works with just about any cell phone. The only problem I had was unrelated to the product. My Samsung S8+ phone's camera function would time out, so I would have to remember to touch it every few minutes or it would revert to the home screen. I'm sure there's a better setting for this, I just don't know what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Topken

customer_reviews.title: clarity and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Magnifications are useless. Image blurred. Colors are desaturated. Phone mount for a camera is excessively fiddly. I should have known and honestly expected it not to work well. But I purchased it based on some good reviews and the cost. Some things you can get away with lower priced products. Optics is not one of those things. This spotting scope may be OK for a youngster where the life of the product would be a few months. In that situation it may make purchase sense. Otherwise do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Lingenfelter

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Spotting Scope
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome. Light needs to be just right for really clear viewing. If you are willing to work with it, iPhone viewing can be pretty cool (see video from 60 ft away). I though price was fair and scope seems of high quality. Only 4 stars because nothing is perfect, but this is pretty close.
customer_reviews.author: GRMichigan buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a spotting scope for shooting at 200 yards and farther. was not expecting the phone adapter, which is a little clumsy, but once you figure it out, can also be fun. I took a photo of a goldfinch sitting in a backyard tree - 20X at about 50 feet, and it fills the frame in sharp focus. This will work fine for my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap spotting scope it has great glass. The issue is the housing and lock collar. I literally took it out of the box today, 1 month after I received it. I tightened the collar because it was delivered loose and it broke. Now I can't return it because it's past 30 days. What a crock. Every optics company warranties their products for at least a year if not a lifetime. Save yourself the the money and buy a good name brand spotting scope.
customer_reviews.author: Bender5k

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for bird watching.
customer_reviews.text: My family use this spotting scope for bird watching. We have several feeders around the yard and this scope is perfect for getting up close. It is bigger and heavier than I thought but alway use it at home so carrying it around is not an issue for us, we have already had much fun with this spotting scope.
customer_reviews.author: Tanja

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scope for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great scope for zeroing out to 100m! Recommend putting on camera tripod rather than use the included bench tripod. Dropped it a couple of times and no damage. Could easily spot hits while zeroing my AR-15 and saved us a lot of walking to/from the target. Sure there are better (and more expensive!) scopes available, but for the price, this works great for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: DMX

customer_reviews.title: Good scope
customer_reviews.text: Good scope. Use it for looking at the moon and planets. Not the best for that, but still works well. Slight color diffraction for the planets and moon. Still a very nice and tough scope
customer_reviews.author: NWM

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My first choice was Gosky 20-60x60 and I should stick to it. 20-60x80 it’s overpriced. On maximum zoom quality picture it’s not so good. To much shaking and blurry. I still have a problem with phone attachment and looks like on maximum zoom it’s simply not possible to have clear view.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality but exit pupil size ruins it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sharp, bright image, and the top focusing knob keeps the subject in the view field, but the exit pupil size combined with the narrow field of view makes it like looking through a train tunnel. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gruenenwald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scope & Great service
customer_reviews.text: Scope was more than i expected. I'm using it for shooting as well as a little nature watching. Their customer service is beyond 5 star. The cell phone adapter was great. I was able to zoom in on my shots, record, and took some beautiful nature pictures as well. Highly recommend. Get it, you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: MARLENE

customer_reviews.title: I am totally satisfied with what I have seen so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons birthday. He did some scoping around my neighborhood wooded areas. I am totally satisfied with what I have seen so far. Feels sturdy, works very well when mounted to my sturdy tripod. Clarity is excellent both in daylight and in full moon light. Got some real nice photos using my iPhone's camera. We will take it out west for camping. Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Love my Gosky
customer_reviews.text: I can now see my targets clearly to 200 yards when at the range. Great inexpensive spotter. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adaptor does not work well with iPhoneX or dual cameras
customer_reviews.text: The scope is great but the adaptor does not work well with iPhoneX. It does not align/center properly no matter what position you put it in. I do not recommend paying the extra for this particular digiscope adaptor. Research other brands like Celestron NexYZ 3 axis smartphone adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sweeten

customer_reviews.title: The Gosky 20-60X80 does the job very well!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just needs a better tripod. Initially had some difficulty with the zoom. After a short learning curve, the Gosky 20-60X80 lived up to other purchasers positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Lets you know where you are shooting.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to find the target and see the holes out to 100 yards and further. I have only used it out to 100 yards so far. It would be nice if they incorporated a way to encase the tripod for carrying instead of having to be carried as a separate item.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Mann

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Considering this scope was a fraction of the price as some other scopes, they were just ok. For a beginner in birding, wildlife viewing, or hunting they will suffice. However, the clarity and detail was just not there. My 12x50 vortex binoculars actually show a better quality picture/view. Unfortunately, I had to return this scope because it was just not the quality I needed for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.!
customer_reviews.text: I have the top glass in optics for my hunting needs. Got this for Christmas and was unsure, but now that I have used it at the range and in the field all I can say is,"If you can't afford to buy the $2500.00 this Gosky is the ticket!.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Ayala

customer_reviews.title: 100yd scope. Tripod is garbage. Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Update after using it multiple dates: This is a 200yd scope. Honestly, it's pushing it at that. Even with the heavy duty tripod I bought. I'd recommend buying something better if you're in to long range shooting. You get what you pay for. This is good for getting your scope initially sighted in. Up to 200. That's it. Previous: Good bang for the buck. Not amazing, but damn near as good as ones double the price. Took of a star because the tripod that comes with it is straight garbage. I threw it away the first day. Plan on buying a better tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great scope and fantastic customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this scope for watching eagles feeding on a local lake. It was great until the focusing knob would not focus. Gosky customer service is incredible! In under 24 hours I got a response to my email. They resolved the issue so fast I was amazed. Not only is this a great scope and takes great pictures but the company was so easy to work with. You can’t go wrong with this scope.Great scope and fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Short

customer_reviews.title: An enjoyable gift for teens or adults
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my science-teacher husband, and we both love it. We've used it, with an iPhone, to photograph a full moon and it's great for bird-watching. The tripod is small; we found a used full-size one and that really enhances its use. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Christie

customer_reviews.title: Bad adapter, didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of really good reviews of this product. However, I was totally frustrated trying to line up the phone with the scope and finally just sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great scope
customer_reviews.text: This scope does just what I bought it for, helps with the San Pablo Bay bird census. Easy focus, clear images. Once you get the phone picture adapter sorted out you can use your phone (although this works for still objects best).
customer_reviews.author: Oldgriz

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well...
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of a chore to get it setup, however once you do try not to mess with it. Pretty decent quality and I must say, this is a great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Pipkin Photography and Audio

customer_reviews.title: Nice optic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very clear at lower power but at maximum magnification it can get a little fuzzy especially on something moving. That said for the price I am extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: BigBlueXC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! I had an issue of no instructions included in packaging and customer service made sure to email me a PDF of them. Took some practice with the phone attachment but I think we figured it all out (helps to find a youtube video). Excited to use this in Yellowstone this coming summer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miracky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a small price point
customer_reviews.text: The lenses have not fogged on me at the range. The construction is solid and I have accidentally knocked it off the shooting stand a hand full of times without anythign breaking. The only drawback is the low light quality...however, for the price point it exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: It's just so-so. Maybe save up for something else.
customer_reviews.text: It's just so-so, 2.5 stars. At lower magnification it has barely acceptable clarity. Once turned up to max magnification, mine blurs out noticably. Used it 5 or 6 times, and it hasn't broken yet, so I bumped it from 2 to 3 on the rating. Definitely a budget product. If wanting for Clarity at Long Range / Maximum Magnification, save up and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great scope. We are using it to view the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great scope. We are using it to view the mountains across the valley from our home. It's easy to set up and use and gives a nice clear view of things. Want to know what that big building is at the base of the valley - this scope will let you see the sign on the front door! Don't know about the tabletop tripod sent with the scope as we used our stand-up camera tripod. Works great and a fun addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its not the best spotting glass, but it will do just fine for most folks out to 100 to 500 yards. The mounting stand is the weak link, it is susceptible to movement and shake.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: the smart phone attachment is tricky but works after a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price of this scope; the smart phone attachment is tricky but works after a little fudging, comes with nice table-top tripod too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SPOTTER FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT SPOTTER FOR THE MONEY. FULL ZOOM GETS SLIGHTLY FUZZY BUT JUST BACK OFF TO AROUND THE 55 ZOOM MARK AND ALL LOOKS GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay up for something better
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should not have expected a lot from this item based on price. It works reasonably well when viewing things a few hundred yards away. Anything further and there is a very limited visible area in focus.
customer_reviews.author: Bullweezer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this out to the range a few times and it has performed well. I was easily able to see .223 holes at 100 yards. When I pushed it out to 400 yards I could see the targets, but couldn't make out any holes. The cell phone attachment is a nice bonus, and made it easier for multiple people to see what's going on simultaneously; that being said my phone kept trying to autofocus which made it difficult to focus the scope (highly recommend disabling autofocus when using with the scope).
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great value at a good pricepoint
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our trip to.Yellowstone National Park! We would set it up on the roof of the cab and had amazing views standing in the bed to see through. We look forward to using it more on future travels and excursions through various state parks.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Jones Cannon

customer_reviews.title: I use it to watch birds in the back yard and it's perfect for that
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! For the money, this scope is hard to beat. I use it to watch birds in the back yard and it's perfect for that. Even without the bundled items it would be a great value but with those items it's an outstanding buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic qualtiy at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely need a spotting scope for bird watching. The spotting scope is perfect for my purpose. I am regularly around guys who use Swarovski scopes which can be twenty times the price and give a great image. But this scope performs well at what it is supposed to. Fantastic quality at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Nice scope for looking at the moon and spotting. I can mount my iPhone to get photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, great optics
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful optics in a nice carry pouch. I keep it in my vehicle and use it to view landscape, birds, animals and anything that I would like to capture with a lens.
customer_reviews.author: David Roach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scope for those on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service. Very happy with the quality of spotting scope, wish they offered a heavy duty tripod to mount it on!... purchase was well with the money..
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat ok.
customer_reviews.text: Cumbersome adjustments. Maybe bird watchers have patience for this. Not me. Does what is say. But I expected something else which just works. And more simple. Pictures shown are a bit misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cool scope. The vision is very clear
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool scope. The vision is very clear. I tried to watching the moon and never have such a clear view to the moon surface. The cell phone rack is also a very good asset of the scope that I shoot some moon pictures and post them to my WeChat. The tripod interface is universal that I could easily attach the scope to my own tripod. The one within packet is a very simple one and only fit for desktop.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of nice packaging and the cell phone attachment is ingenious
customer_reviews.author: az**hm

customer_reviews.title: powerful and clear
customer_reviews.text: Tripod does not hold telescope steady and can't be adjusted well
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: See clearly what you hit.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Zooms in on my targets and lets me record my shot placement with the phone attachment. Very cool. It is also very clear with a feel of quality when adjusting the focus. The tripod is lower end but functional. If tripod had a case, that would be icing on the cake. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely amazed at the clarity and ease of this spotter scope!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Beyone Expectation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the optics, even at full power. I can clearly see the water buckets against the barn 1/2 a mile away and the handles on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Deb and Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Spend some money and get a better scope
customer_reviews.text: Price according to product. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Morrisey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband for use on our travels. It’s been a great addition to our array of products we use for viewing and photography.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Taylor

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: good stuff, very clear at 100 yards. I have not used this for any greater distance yet
customer_reviews.author: Gary U.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scope
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with scope.So far I have been able to see very long distances approximately 1000 yards with very nice clarity. Great scope for the money. I cannot wait to use it while hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle

customer_reviews.title: Gosky 20-60x spotting scope
customer_reviews.text: I dont write a lot of reviews, but the quality of this scope exceeds my expectations. The images are bright and clear and the tripod and iphone digiscoping adapter work very well. The package is excellent, worth well more than the price.
customer_reviews.author: G Loch

customer_reviews.title: Was a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although this was easy to set-up and use I found the quality at a distance wasn't good and that is what I had purchased it for. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.

customer_reviews.title: Great scope
customer_reviews.text: The scope is really sweet. The tripod and phone holder are low quality. If I was simply rating the scope I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great scope!
customer_reviews.text: The scope is great. The heavy duty replacement tripod that the seller sent me for the scope works really well. This seller has great customer service and really stands behind his products. I will definitely buy from him again!.
customer_reviews.author: LJC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved this to look at deer and coyotes on our land.
customer_reviews.author: Beck Berry

customer_reviews.title: The Gosky 20-60x80 is a great scope. The digiscoping attachments, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The scope, itself, is great! The digiscoping attachments did not work for me with a Galaxy Note 4. Glad I have this scope. I threw my Celestron in the trash after I got the Gosky.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: With the right targets at 100 yds shots are easy to pick up. ( don’t use large black circles . For the money the clarity is really good. Don’t feel the 60xzoom is as far as they claim .
customer_reviews.author: blair hohn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a very strong scope! Overkill, for me...but, I kind of like counting a doves eyelashes😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Webb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can easily see a 22cal. shot at 100 yrds. meets all of my needs at the range
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, Gosky 20-60 x 80, it does the job nicely. Used it out to 200 yards with 223 ammo. Not the clearest but you can identify holes in paper and that suited my need.
customer_reviews.author: the_wraith

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scope for the price. Nice and clear at 200 yards!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good spotter, but...
customer_reviews.text: The spotter works great, but the phone attachment is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very good value versus competition
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a great product for the price. Saw very clean out to 400 yards today. 200 yards and in is crystal clear. Like other reviews, a more solid tripod would improve overall function but once you have the target acquired it’s very sturdy. Could be me but I had a hard time lining up my iPhone with the eye mount. Not a big deal for me however
customer_reviews.author: Erik Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it does well. Not a top end scope but much better than the cheap scopes. A true middle of the road scope.
customer_reviews.author: MattP1

customer_reviews.title: Very clear optic
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional image quality for the price. Using as a spotting scope and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Able

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to record through the camera while shooting down range.
customer_reviews.author: ChiefTain

customer_reviews.title: Magnification is excellent and can keep clear focas even at max magnification
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the range where I shoot with my kids. Magnification is excellent and can keep clear focas even at max magnification. We use it to about 500 yards sometimes with the phone adapter mostly without. Stand is solid enough overall I’m very happy with this scope. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic image.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Amazing image quality in my humble opinion. Works great with cell phone attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it I got bad one, or if this is just what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Have fought with the eyepiece locking ring since day one. It will not lock and the entire eyepiece is loose and wobbly. Not sure it I got bad one, or if this is just what I should expect. Have given up trying to contact anyone about getting it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: William S

customer_reviews.title: Gosky 20-60x80 spotting scope - good quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Gosky spotting scope. Very user friendly, quality optics for my use and should stand the test of time if properly cared for.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price clear vision and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price clear vision and easy to adjust the ring to change the power is a little stiff but in time I think it will loosen up some.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice photos. Do keep in mind that this is ...
customer_reviews.text: The adaptor for phones works quite well. Nice photos. Do keep in mind that this is a 5+ pound scope so a flimsy tripod wont do; the image will not stay put and its harder to locate birds. Invest in a proper tripod. All in all its a good buy
customer_reviews.author: DANNY G.

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today and thus far it is better than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and thus far it is better than I anticipated. Everything works as prescribed; have had no trouble with instructions or assembly, power adjustment and focus work better than I expected. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ... as clear as I expected but it is not bad. I have not tried the phone mount yet
customer_reviews.text: Seems okay was not as clear as I expected but it is not bad. I have not tried the phone mount yet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Fairly happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with scope. Camera adapter works well on my old galexy phone. Tripod leaves a lot to be desired. Took a bit to manage the focus between scope and camera but getting good photos.
customer_reviews.author: bk324

customer_reviews.title: Decent spotting scope.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly crafted unit, images are good. I haven't had any problems with it yet but it seems as a worthwhile purchase for what I was looking for in it's price range.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Everything about it it was of great quality. I did however end up getting a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my father, it more than exceeded my expectations. Everything about it it was of great quality. I did however end up getting a floor stand for it, instead the short pod it cam with.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality for price. Portable and easy to use. Able to take great pictures and videos while birding with IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Marsella

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The scope is well worth the money. Someone needs to figure out a cost effective tripod for it that won't shake or vibrate when it's breezy outside. Maybe if I had a smart phone with image stabilization features, that might solve the problem
customer_reviews.author: john spolski

customer_reviews.title: Image aberration at maximum magnification
customer_reviews.text: had high expectations based on so many 4 and 5 stars review ... BUT ... there is image aberration at maximum magnification that cannot be corrected with focus adjustments. At the lower magnifications, the images are ok (not great but acceptable). Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: pacifico

customer_reviews.title: good scope great price
customer_reviews.text: No problem with clarity out to 800 yards. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: tony mudrock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: can actually count gravel in neighbors driveway 100 yards away.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Gosky 20-60 X 80 Porro Prism Spotting Scope- Waterproof Scope for Bird Watching Target Shooting Archery Range Outdoor Activities -with Tripod & Digiscoping Adapter
feature_bullets: Fully multi-coated 80mm green film objective lens, eyepiece and quality prism inside - guarentee the key elements of a spotting scope, and make your view brighter, clearer and delivers crisp images.
Variable 20x to 60x magnification and dynamic lens focusing system -- makes it easy to zoom in on target. Designed for birdwatching, watching wildlife and scenery.

Durable Magnalium Framework and Rubber Armor - Its tight fitting protection makes it usable to withstand the toughest weather conditions. The shock-absorbing rubber armor for maximum protection. And the eyepiece shield can be stretched out to protect the eyepiece.
Waterproof Design : Its sealing property ensures the living waterproof function.

Comes with a digiscoping adapter for digiscoping. (Note: for all spotting scopes, the original picture is in a circle, pleae zoom the camera to get a full screen picture.) It also comes with Carrying Case, Eyepiece and Lens Protection Covers, Cleaning Cloth and handy Straps.
